title: Uvalde police chief says he wasn't in command. Bodycam footage suggests otherwise
description: Uvalde school district police chief Pete Arredondo said he was not the on-scene commander the day of the school shooting. But bodycam footage obtained by CNN shows he was at the center of the police response that day.

title: Rapper storms off stage after hecklers throw objects at him
description: Kid Cudi quits performing after hecklers throw objects at him. The rapper replaced Kanye West who dropped out days before the Rolling Loud festival.

title: Liz Cheney: Trump is unfit for further office
description: The committee investigating the events surrounding the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol will "contemplate a subpoena" for Virginia "Ginni" Thomas, the wife of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas, if she does not voluntarily meet with the committee over her role in advocating to overturn the 2020 election results, the committee's co-chair said Sunday.

title: Rep. Liz Cheney responds to Trump's efforts to defeat her
description: Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) defended her criticism of former President Donald Trump on Fox by citing an editorial criticizing Trump in the New York Post, which is owned by Rupert Murdoch.

title: Buttigieg on GOP opposition to codifying same-sex marriage: 'Our marriage deserves to be treated equally'
description: Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg responded Sunday to Republican opposition to codifying same-sex marriage, criticizing House Republicans for opposing a bill to do just that hours after he was in a room with them talking about transportation policy.

title: French Grand Prix: Max Verstappen wins after devastated Charles Leclerc crashes out with 'unacceptable' mistake
description: Max Verstappen eased to victory at the French Grand Prix to extend his championship lead over a devastated Charles Leclerc, whose recent woes continued with a high-speed crash on Sunday.

title: 'Get off of his neck!': Woman captures violent arrest of boyfriend in his own home
description: A Tennessee police officer is on administrative leave after the violent arrest of Brandon Calloway in his own home was recorded by his girlfriend, Tamia Caldwell. Authorities followed Calloway into his home after he allegedly failed to stop at a stop sign and fled the scene. The state's Bureau of Investigation is looking into the matter. CNN's Nadia Romero reports.

title: Japan's Sakurajima volcano erupts, prompting highest alert
description: Japan's Sakurajima volcano, located on the island of Kyushu, erupted on Sunday, prompting evacuations in the region.

title: Millions to endure alarmingly high temperatures Sunday as heat wave scorches mid-South, Northeast
description: The deadly heat wave scorching much of the US will continue Sunday, when the Northeast and mid-South regions are likely to be suffocated by temperatures that feel as hot as 100 degrees or higher.

title: Greece battles fire that forced hundreds to evacuate on island of Lesbos
description: Hundreds of residents and tourists have been evacuated on the Greek island of Lesbos after a wildfire broke out, burning houses and threatening villages.

title: How to survive a rattlesnake bite -- or better yet, avoid one
description: Talk about a heavenly day: The Blue Ridge Mountains of North Carolina, temperatures in the low 70s and low humidity.

title: Panel used never-before-seen material to try to prove Trump's role in riot
description: On Thursday, the House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021 attack on the US Capitol concluded its first series of hearings where it heard from witnesses including top ex-Trump officials, election workers, those who took part in the attack, and many others.

title: Boris Johnson's successor will have a huge mess on their hands
Russian Navy's massive submarine could set the stage for 'a new Cold war'
description: The Russian Navy has taken delivery of what is the world's longest known submarine, one its maker touts as a research vessel -- but what others say is a platform for espionage and possibly nuclear weapons.

title: China: Xi given domestic Covid vaccine
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping and other leaders in the country have been given domestic Covid-19 vaccines, the ruling Communist party said in a rare disclosure aimed at stimulating China's booster program.

title: 4 inmates captured within hours of fleeing
description: Four inmates who escaped a minimum-security housing unit in Chattanooga, Tennessee, are back in custody, just hours after their getaway Saturday, according to the Hamilton County Sheriff's Office.

title: What the Fed and Madonna have in common
description: Since its founding in 1913, the US Federal Reserve has fought to achieve three goals: maximum employment, stable prices and moderate long-term interest rates. But that's about all that's remained consistent in the central bank's 109-year legacy of monetary policy.

title: Opinion: The missing piece in the January 6 hearings
description: "It was missing a piece. And it was not happy." So begins Shel Silverstein's 1976 children's book, "The Missing Piece."

title: Women's Euro 2022: France breach Dutch defense to end quarterfinal curse
description: France reached their first ever Women's Euro semifinal after a 1-0 extra time win over the reigning champions the Netherlands in Rotherham, England on Saturday.

title: Pope Francis visiting Canada to apologize for Indigenous abuse in Catholic residential schools
description: Pope Francis departed Rome on Sunday for a week-long trip to Edmonton, Canada, where he's set to apologize for the Catholic Church's role in the abuse of Canadian Indigenous children in residential schools.

title: Russian missiles strike Odesa one day after grain export deal agreed
description: Russian missile strikes have hit the southern Ukrainian port of Odesa, just one day after Ukraine and Russia agreed on a deal that would allow the resumption of vital grain exports from the region.

title: A Pennsylvania waitress was shocked when she received a $3,000 tip
description: A customer at a restaurant in Pennsylvania left a hefty $3,000 tip on a $13.25 bill, much to the surprise of his server.

title: Why you should reinstate the classic alarm clock
description: I have reinstated the alarm clock. An overlooked mechanism in today's technologically-synced, your-phone-does-everything world, it tells the time, it wakes you up, it is decentralized from a phone. It is marvelous.

title: Shifting your relationship from 'me' to 'we'
description: It isn't every day that Bruce Springsteen opens up about his experiences in couples therapy, in this case in the foreword of a book by renowned marriage and family therapist Terrence Real.

title: Ukrainian military couples rush to the altar amid uncertainty of war
description: By late morning, a line has already formed outside the nondescript registration office on the western edge of Kyiv. Some of those waiting are wearing casual clothes, but a few of the women are dressed up in white and carrying bouquets of flowers.

title: 'Black Panther: Wakanda Forever' teaser trailer is here and...wow
description: Marvel has released a new look at the next chapter of "Black Panther" and it's powerful.

title: China executes man who set fire to his ex-wife during livestream
description: A man who killed his ex-wife by setting her on fire during a livestream was executed in China on Saturday, state media reported, marking the end of a case that prompted horror and outrage across the country.
